name: TechRestore, Inc.
tag_list: apple, mac, macintosh, macbook, macbook-pro, powerbook, ibook, iphone, ipod, ipod-touch, mac-repair, iphone-repair, ipod-repair
overview:
TechRestore provides overnight repairs and upgrades for Apple Macintosh laptops (MacBooks, MacBook Pro, PowerBook, iBook), iPod, iPhone and portable gaming devices like the Sony PSP. They offer 2000+ local drop-off locations throughout the United States and their typical repair turnaround time is 24-hours. Free return shipping is available for all of their service offerings.

TechRestore publishes popular stop-motion take apart videos that show the inner workings of the devices that they work on. All of their videos can be viewed at http://youtube.com/techrestore

TechRestore is a 100% green company that offers E-Waste recycling for consumers throughout the country. All E-Waste is recycled in partnership with a California Certified E-Waste recycler. TechRestore provides more information on their green initiatives at http://techrestore.com/recycle

TechRestore was awarded a 2009 MacWorld Expo Best of Show award for their development of the only Anti-Glare, Matte finish screen replacement service for the Unibody MacBook and MacBook Pro systems.

TechRestore is an authorized Axiotron ModBook Service Provider that provides overnight ModService conversion of existing MacBook and MacBook Pro systems to the ModBook Mac tablet.

products.name: Unibody MacBook Anti-Glare Matte Finish Screen Replacement
